author: markt
msg: First pass at getting DBCP to compile with Java 7 to keep Gump happy. Whether or not we create a DBCP_1.5 branch and actually release this is a different question. The aim is to continue to be able to release 1.4 from this branch with Java 6.
I need to check this in before I start testing the 1.4 build otherwise my changes will be modified/lost as I test the build.
